ygData.messageBody:
Nat Russo wrote:
>
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Being a complete newbie, you can imagine that a good portion of my time is
> spent running toward the nearest guard in Tox forest.
>
> However, they rarely if ever actually do anything to help me, and I wind up
> having to zone to make sure that I am safe (from those pesky skeletons that
> seem to come in pairs). Is there a trick to getting the guards to take the
> heat, or are they supposed to do it automatically? I was under the
> impression that they were supposed to help automatically.
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Olatan
>

Try to stop near them so they have a chance to attack the skeletons.
Generally though, if you are low on life best just zone because the
guards are slow to react.

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
